refnamediv.refpurpose: Base class for GtkHButtonBox and GtkVButtonBox

refsynopsisdiv.title: Synopsis

refsect1.title: Style Properties
refsect1.synopsis: child-internal-pad-x gint : Read child-internal-pad-y gint : Read child-min-height gint : Read child-min-width gint : Read

refsect1.title: Description
refsect1.para: The primary purpose of this class is to keep track of the various properties of GtkHButtonBox and GtkVButtonBox widgets.
The internal padding of buttons can be retrieved and changed per button box using gtk_button_box_get_child_ipadding() and gtk_button_box_set_child_ipadding() respectively.
gtk_button_box_get_spacing() and gtk_button_box_set_spacing() retrieve and change default number of pixels between buttons, respectively.
gtk_button_box_get_layout() and gtk_button_box_set_layout() retrieve and alter the method used to spread the buttons in a button box across the container, respectively.

The main purpose of GtkButtonBox is to make sure the children have all the same size. Therefore it ignores the homogeneous property which it inherited from GtkBox, and always behaves as if homogeneous was TRUE.

refsect2.title: GtkButtonBox
refsect2.para: This is a read-only struct; no members should be modified directly.

refsect2.title: GTK_BUTTONBOX_DEFAULT
refsect2.para: Used internally only.

refsect2.title: gtk_button_box_get_spacing()

warning.para: gtk_button_box_get_spacing is deprecated and should not be used in newly-written code.

refsect2.para: Retrieves how much space a button box is placing between each child button.

listitem.simpara: a GtkButtonBox
the current spacing applied to the buttons in widget.

refsect2.title: gtk_button_box_get_layout ()
refsect2.para: Retrieves the method being used to arrange the buttons in a button box.

listitem.simpara: a GtkButtonBox.
the method used to layout buttons in widget.

refsect2.title: gtk_button_box_get_child_size ()

warning.para: gtk_button_box_get_child_size is deprecated and should not be used in newly-written code. Use the style properties "child-min-width/-height" instead.

refsect2.para: Retrieves the current width and height of all child widgets in a button box. min_width and min_height are filled with those values, respectively.

listitem.simpara: a GtkButtonBox.
the width of the buttons contained by widget.
the height of the buttons contained by widget.

refsect2.title: gtk_button_box_get_child_ipadding ()

warning.para: gtk_button_box_get_child_ipadding is deprecated and should not be used in newly-written code. Use the style properties "child-internal-pad-x/-y" instead.

refsect2.para: Gets the default number of pixels that pad the buttons in a given button box.

listitem.simpara: a GtkButtonBox.
the horizontal padding used by buttons in widget.
the vertical padding used by buttons in widget.

refsect2.title: gtk_button_box_get_child_secondary ()
refsect2.para: Returns whether child should appear in a secondary group of children.

listitem.simpara: a GtkButtonBox
a child of widget
whether child should appear in a secondary group of children.

refsect2.para: Since 2.4

refsect2.title: gtk_button_box_set_spacing()

warning.para: gtk_button_box_set_spacing is deprecated and should not be used in newly-written code.

refsect2.para: Sets the amount of spacing between buttons in a given button box.

listitem.simpara: a GtkButtonBox.
the number of pixels of spacing.

refsect2.title: gtk_button_box_set_layout ()
refsect2.para: Changes the way buttons are arranged in their container.

listitem.simpara: a GtkButtonBox.
the new layout style.

refsect2.title: gtk_button_box_set_child_size ()

warning.para: gtk_button_box_set_child_size is deprecated and should not be used in newly-written code. Use the style properties "child-min-width/-height" instead.

refsect2.para: Sets a new default size for the children of a given button box.

listitem.simpara: a GtkButtonBox.
a default width for buttons in widget.
a default height for buttons in widget.

refsect2.title: gtk_button_box_set_child_ipadding ()

warning.para: gtk_button_box_set_child_ipadding is deprecated and should not be used in newly-written code. Use the style properties "child-internal-pad-x/-y" instead.

refsect2.para: Changes the amount of internal padding used by all buttons in a given button box.

listitem.simpara: a GtkButtonBox.
the horizontal padding that should be used by each button in widget.
the vertical padding that should be used by each button in widget.

refsect2.title: gtk_button_box_set_child_secondary ()
refsect2.para: Sets whether child should appear in a secondary group of children. A typical use of a secondary child is the help button in a dialog.

This group appears after the other children if the style is GTK_BUTTONBOX_START, GTK_BUTTONBOX_SPREAD or GTK_BUTTONBOX_EDGE, and before the other children if the style is GTK_BUTTONBOX_END. For horizontal button boxes, the definition of before/after depends on direction of the widget (see gtk_widget_set_direction()). If the style is GTK_BUTTONBOX_START or GTK_BUTTONBOX_END, then the secondary children are aligned at the other end of the button box from the main children. For the other styles, they appear immediately next to the main children.

listitem.simpara: a GtkButtonBox
a child of widget
if TRUE, the child appears in a secondary group of the button box.

refsect2.title: The :layout-style property
refsect2.para: How to layout the buttons in the box. Possible values are default, spread, edge, start and end.
Default value: GTK_BUTTONBOX_DEFAULT_STYLE

refsect2.title: The :secondary child property
refsect2.para: If TRUE, the child appears in a secondary group of children, suitable for, e.g., help buttons.
Default value: FALSE

refsect2.title: The :child-internal-pad-x style property
refsect2.para: Amount to increase child's size on either side.
Allowed values: >= 0
Default value: 4

refsect2.title: The :child-internal-pad-y style property
refsect2.para: Amount to increase child's size on the top and bottom.
Allowed values: >= 0
Default value: 0

refsect2.title: The :child-min-height style property
refsect2.para: Minimum height of buttons inside the box.
Allowed values: >= 0
Default value: 27

refsect2.title: The :child-min-width style property
refsect2.para: Minimum width of buttons inside the box.
Allowed values: >= 0
Default value: 85
